subject: RE: Kingsville Trades Quote
preview: Amazing - I received it now.  NovariSupport@novaricollective.com - can you confirm you received an email acceptance for the Kingsville job?  Mikaela Camilleri  Property styling and interior design adm

Hi Mikaela,

I hope you are doing well.

We can confirm that the notification triggers is working. We've tried and resend the email to mcamilleri@novaricollective.com, novarisupport@novaricollective.com.

Can you please confirm if you have received it?

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Elaine,


We should both receive an acceptance email, similar to what we receive when a property styling job gets approved. I thought you may have received this acceptance email, but it looks like we both didn't receive this for this particular job.


@Wolf IQ Support are you able to look into why both melbourne@ and novarisupport@ emails didn't receive acceptance email for the Kingsville quote that recently got approved?


Does this have anything to do with selecting either Syd or Mel in the Install Details (Section 3)? As I'm not sure if this was done when the quote was issued ..

Mikaela Camilleri
Property styling and interior design admin

0455 523 940

03 9580 4102

mcamilleri@novaricollective.com

You don't need to wait for a booking form for this.

Let me know if this makes sense.
